title: [Goldman Sachs] 2024 Investment Banking Autumn Off-Cycle Internship Program (Seoul)
author: 글로벌리더십센터 최여진
content:
Program
Internship Period
Eligibility
Application Deadline
2024 Investment Banking Autumn Seoul Off-Cycle Internship Program
September 23, 2024 to December 20, 2024
Students graduating from a Bachelor's or Master's degree program.
 Proficiency in written and spoken Korean.
August 11, 2024 at 11:59 p.m. KST
 Applications are reviewed on a rolling basis and we encourage students to apply as soon as they are ready.
 Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out to the APAC Campus Recruiting team.
